info.name: Youtube WideScreen (New Design Polymer) v.4
info.description:
For a wide Screen and the YouTube new Design:
Player stay fixed at the LEFT side.
- Videos related and in queue on the RIGHT side
- Infos, Comment on the RIGHT side ( visible on hover their tabs)
- Progress Bar is always visible
So, you can watch the video AND read infos / Comments, choose next video without problem.
info.additionalInfo: It's Userscript version, here: Youtube WideScreen (New Design Polymer) Userscripts support for: - Youtube UI Fix - Youtube - Search While Watching Video - Youtube - dismiss sign-in - Video Speed Buttons Change in v.4: - Solve a problem around some related video thumbnail not loading. - Add counter for comments really loaded (we should wait their loading before seeing the comments tab too) - Some corrections around player and supported userscripts... - Support for no Dark mode. It's a quick support , need more fine tuning, but i use always the Dark mode... - Correction video player: centre movie. By example for horizontal center: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_DsyLuxfu64 and vertical center: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yUif6C_uJgk
